summary.overview: This JCL job performs RACF security administration tasks to manage user access and group memberships. It adds a member to a RACF group and connects a user to an application development group for proper system access permissions.
business_functions: Add member CT02 to the GCICSTRN RACF group with CARD access authority
Connect user AWSCODR to the M2APPDEV application development group for system access permissions

RACFCMDS.jcl.program_overview: TSO Terminal Monitor Program - Executes TSO commands in batch mode for security administration

datasource_summary.name: System Output Report (SYSTSPRT)
datasource_summary.function: Captures and stores the results and messages from RACF security administration commands for review and audit purposes

datasource_summary.name: RACF Command Input Stream (SYSTSIN)
datasource_summary.function: Contains RACF security commands for user profile modifications and group connection management that need to be executed in batch mode

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
